subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: Officiating in pro football’s Week 2 saw extra timeouts awarded and incomplete passes called as fumbles, but the N.F.L. said current officials were acting “admirably.”
snippet: Officiating in pro football’s Week 2 saw extra timeouts awarded and incomplete passes called as fumbles, but the N.F.L. said current officials were acting “admirably.”
